mcp.mobius.waila.api

Interface IWailaBlockDecorator


  • public interface IWailaBlockDecorator
    Callback class interface used to provide Block/TileEntity decorator.
    All methods in this interface shouldn't to be called by the implementing mod. An instance of the class is to be registered to Waila via the IWailaRegistrar instance provided in the original registration callback method (cf. IWailaRegistrar documentation for more information).
    Author:
    ProfMobius

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void decorateBlock(ItemStack itemStack, IWailaDataAccessor accessor, IWailaConfigHandler config)
      Callback for the decorator.

    • Method Detail

      • decorateBlock

        void decorateBlock(ItemStack itemStack,
                   IWailaDataAccessor accessor,
                   IWailaConfigHandler config)
        Callback for the decorator. It provides a standard GL stack positioned on the block.
        Will be used if the implementing class is registered via IWailaRegistrar.registerDecorator.
        Parameters:
        itemStack - Current block scanned, in ItemStack form.
        accessor - Contains most of the relevant information about the current environment.
        config - Current configuration of Waila.
